title: Tool
description:
The Frontier Touring Company announce the return of triple GrammyÂ® award winning Californian prog-rockers Tool to Australia in 2013.

Taking time from recording their highly anticipated fifth studio album, vocalist Maynard James Keenan, guitarist Adam Jones, drummer Danny Carey and bassist Justin Chancellor will be performing a headline show at Allphones Arena this May.

Tool have perfected a genre-transcending sound that can be likened to fine art, interlaced with atypical time signatures, intricate drumming patterns and a resonance with a force that awakens the senses.
